name: Dreaming Cat
description:
This is my submission for the GBJAM8.

It is a little platformer-game. You play as a cat, that dreams of getting some food. You jump through the levels and collect the catfood.

Controls:
  • Arrow-Keys: Move
  • F: Jump
  • H: Open/Close Pause-Menu
  • Enter: Interact
Download-Instructions:
  1. Download the .zip-File
  2. Right click and extract 
  3. Double click the exe-File

-I hope you enjoy it-
